title: Quake 4 playthrough -- Part 1
description: After playing Quake 3 randomly I decided to play Quake 4 again because it's been so damn long since I have. Turns out it's better than Duke Nukem Forever, so that's good. The weapons are actually fun to use and although all the levels are extremely similar it's quite fun.
